We ❤️ our sponsors, and we hope you will, too.

  • A front-end focused development consultancy, that specializes in javascript-heavy websites, web performance, a/b testing & analytics.

  • Futurice is a new breed of innovation consultancy with digital values at its core. We inject life into digital – all with a focus on user experience and interaction. We believe in happy people, happy customers and happy users.

  • Day One is a journaling app for the iPhone, iPad, and Mac with an elegant interface makes journaling your life a simple pleasure.

  • DailyDrip gives you daily content that’s tailored to what you want to learn. It only takes about 5 minutes a day and you retain more than if you were binge learning.

Production in Elm Town - Episode 10

Jan 12, 2017

Kevin Yank and Richard Feldman join us for a discussion about shipping!
